text: Black Mountain is a mountain in Kentucky. It is the highest mountain peak in the state of Kentucky, USA. The height of the summit is ."Science In Your Backyard: Kentucky" U.S. Department of the Interior | U.S. Geological Survey, July 3, 2006, retrieved August 25, 2006 It is near the Virginia border. Black bears and lions live on the mountain. == References == Category:Mountains of the United States Category:Geography of Kentucky Category:Appalachian Mountains
title: Black Mountain (Kentucky)
